name: Claim Health
long_description:
Post-acute care loses billions to broken revenue infrastructure. Claim Health prevents it. We catch denials before they happen, automate the work drowning ops teams, and connect every step from referral to cash so agencies can scale without adding headcount.

Kevin and JJ bring nearly a decade of experience building and scaling healthtech companies across different segments. 

Post-acute care is a $400B market with over $20B in annual revenue leakage due to broken revenue infrastructure. Claim Health is fixing that.
one_liner: AI Revenue Platform for Post-Acute Care
